data.name: This Game is Crap
data.detailed_description:
This game has only one goal to make you cry. If you think something doesn't work as it should, then you're thinking right.



Beware of the following notes Spoiler game content:

This Game is Crap is a 2D jump and run comedy game that contains a lot of drops to deceive the player. It currently contains ten levels (more are planned) and impresses less with gamplay than with funny ideas. It is ideal to fool friends and good for playing in between.

- Jump & Run
- 19 Levels
- Audio (no settings)
- Grafik (no settings)
- external Internet links to https:// pages
- Languages: German, English (adjustable in the game)

data.short_description: Give the game enough time and you'll cry. If you're liking sh***** then don't force yourself. You won't look for tips and hints. If you want to annoy your friend, give him this game.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i3-8130U Prozessor 2,20 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1920 * 1080
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: not enough tested yet
